Abilities.name: Inversion
Abilities.description: Converts the user's life force into raw energy, damaging the target.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} drains away its life forcing, hurling it at {TARGET}

Abilities.name: Smack
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} smacks {TARGET} so hard it alters {TARGET}'s DNA.

Abilities.name: Blast
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} annihilates all enemies with explosion magic, devastating the enemies.

Abilities.name: Optical Pat-Down
Abilities.description: Asses the HOSTILE with rough-shod accuracy.

effects.trigger_message: {OWNER} gains the energy to act after being audibly misjudged. (Stamina +10)

Abilities.name: Illusory Weapon
Abilities.description: Change the weapon of the user
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} ingests a tonic and breathes mist onto {TARGET}'s weapon.

effects.trigger_message: {TARGET}'s weapon is replaced with an Iron Scimitar

Abilities.name: Meditate
Abilities.description: Breathe deeply to recover Health and Mana.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} concentrates on his breathing for a few seconds

effects.trigger_message: {OWNER} gains the energy to act again

Abilities.name: Love Tap
Abilities.description: I didn't hit you, that was a love tap.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} hits {TARGET} hard enough to hurt, but not hard enough to justify retaliation.

effects.cleanup_message: {OWNER} is no longer suffering from being love-tapped.

Abilities.name: Kidnap
Abilities.description: Kidnap the target, making them unable to act for a single turn
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} kidnaps {TARGET} (and {TARGET}'s cat), preventing them from acting.

effects.trigger_message: {OWNER} has been kidnapped and cannot act.

Abilities.name: Spit
Abilities.description: Spits on the target, accomplishing nearly nothing

Abilities.name: Dupe
Abilities.description: Tricks the target into giving the user some of their Health
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} deceives {TARGET}, stealing Health in the process.

Abilities.name: Bomb-Threat
Abilities.description: Makes a bomb-threat, delaying all friendly entities from acting. Restores Health and Stamina.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} makes a bomb-threat, delaying all friendly entities and restoring resources.

effects.trigger_message: {OWNER} was delayed by the bomb threat!.
effects.cleanup_message: {OWNER} figured out it was a ruse!

Abilities.name: Bounce
Abilities.description: The user flings its mass at the HOSTILE, hoping to deal some damage.

Abilities.name: Water Shot
Abilities.description: The user shoots a powerful stream of water at the target.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} shoots a powerful jet of water at {TARGET}.

Abilities.name: Rock Shot
Abilities.description: The throws a stone at the target with pin-point precision.
